content.text: 0) In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter, sugars and oil.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "cream"@27:32 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the butter"@33:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "sugars"@45:51 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-1 )
			:ref ( ing-2 )
		)
		:ppt ( ing-3 "oil"@56:59 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large mixing bowl"@6:25 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Add eggs and vanilla; mix well.
2) Add flour, salt, baking soda, cinnamon and cream of tartar.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "flour"@7:12 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "salt"@14:18 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "baking soda"@20:31 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "cinnamon"@33:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "cream of tartar"@46:61 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Stir in the pecans if desired.
5) Place on greased baking sheets; flatten with the bottom of a glass dipped in sugar.
6) Sprinkle with colored sugar if desired.
7) Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 10-12 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-7-0 "375 degrees F"@-1:-1/ TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-7-1 "190 degrees C"@-1:-1/ TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "10-12 minutes"@-1:-1 / DUR )
	)
)
